channel.title: How do i make people start in diff place when they die or make acc
channel.description:
how do i make it so when u die they start in a diffrent place because i moved home to legends guild?
how do i make it so when u make an account u start in a diff place because i moved home to legends guild?

item.title: How do i make people start in diff place when they die or make acc
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

that is in player.java
look in the player file for the coords you spawn at
so if you spawn at (508, 908)

Search 508 in your player.java and see if the coords match
you can also change starter armor in there too

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make people start in diff place when they die or make acc
